title: C Workshop for freshers by ACSES, WCE, Sangli
name: C Workshop for freshers by ACSES, WCE, Sangli
body:
ACSES organizes C Workshop every year for the freshers. Learning C in the early stage of your computer science career is most important as C is one of the most basic programming languages, and many things in computer science are built on top of it.
  • Number of participats: > 100 every year.
  • Slides of my session: Taking Input From User
  • C Workshop 2016: This is the fantastic Main Board - 2016 of ACSES. You can find me on the rightmost side in the top row with Prafull Desai (in black shirt) and Omkar Jadhav (in the middle). Omkar Jadhav and I served at the post of Coding Expert as part of ACSES.
  • Setting up all the computers for the workshop. The workshop is conducted in the Mini Central Computing Facility of WCE, Sangli every year.
  • Session on the "Execution Phase" of the C language.
  • Session on the "Compilation Phase" of the C language.
  • The Mentor to the Coding Expert, Swapnil Walke explains the concept of Binary Numbers.
  • The ACSES Board members and volunteers guide the freshers and solve their doubts for the hands-on session.
  • The ACSES Board members and volunteers guide the freshers and solve their doubts for the hands-on session.
